talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>Though I suppose that's neither here
nor there...

Because the gloom won't even have the
chance to do you in!
talk_1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_00>Some "hero" you are.<sp:5:0:0> So heartless...
I feel my rage giving me strength!
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Thank you, you're a real lifesaver!


<snd:LaughS_00>This area is riddled with gloom, <sp:5:0:0>and
I stepped right into it.

<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff>One touch of <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff> will eat away at your
vitality.<sp:5:0:0> Be careful to keep a safe distance.

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>If the gloom does get you, <sp:5:0:0>you should
either <clr:0000>go up to the surface<clr:ffff> or use a
<clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff> as soon as you can.
I've heard rumors that the light of those
giant trees can help too...
talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey, be careful walking around down
here.<sp:5:1:0> Everything's covered in <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
so try to watch your step.
If you do get any gloom on you, use a
<clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> The base should've told you
to always keep a few on hand.
<snd:TalkPositive>If you don't have any, some time on the
surface should fix you up.<sp:5:0:0> I hear those
glowing trees can help too, but I dunno...
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Anyway, I hope Link comes through here
soon. <sp:5:0:0>Pretending to be sick really takes it
out of you.
talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Watch your step around here.<sp:5:0:0> The place
is covered in <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>If you touch any,<sp:5:0:0> you'll need a <clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff>
or some time on the surface.

I've heard that those big trees can help
with gloom too, but I haven't been able
to confirm that yet.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Anyway, I hope Link comes through here
before too long.<sp:5:0:0> I really wanna get back
to the surface.
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:SurpriseM_01>Urgh...<sp:5:0:0> Are...<sp:5:0:0> Are you here to help?<sp:0:4:0>Please...<sp:5:0:0> This is misery.<sp:5:0:0> I'm covered in
<clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff><sp:5:1:0>and I need a <clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff>...
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>It's over for me.<sp:5:0:0> All this <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0> *hack*
<clr:0000>Sundelion<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> If I only had a sundelion.
